Although Bugenhagen's funeral sermon for Luther was not issued with a portrait of the reformer, other publications marking Luther's death that year were. The medallion reproduced on the top cover of the present work is taken from the verso of the title page of Vom Christlichen abschied aus diesem todlichen leben des Ehrwirdigen Herrn D.
